history.proof: intros l. induction l as [|e l' IHl]. - left. reflexivity. - right. exists e. split. + left. reflexivity. + reflexivity.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
pwti: prefix_within_term_interface
lltsi: leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface
llpi: leaderLogs_preserved_interface
eewci: every_entry_was_created_interface
llvwli: leaderLogs_votesWithLog_interface
aevwli: allEntries_votesWithLog_interface
vwlsi: votesWithLog_sorted_interface
taifoi: terms_and_indices_from_one_interface
lllmi: leaderLogs_entries_match_interface

Goal:
forall l : list entry, maxIndex l = 0 \/ (exists e : entry, In e l /\ eIndex e = maxIndex l)

Premises:
maxIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxIndex (entries : list entry) : logIndex := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eIndex e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex Arguments maxIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Record leaderLogs_preserved_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_preserved_interface { leaderLogs_preserved_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_preserved net } Arguments leaderLogs_preserved_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_preserved_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
eIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, eIndex, _, _) := e in eIndex : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> logIndex Arguments eIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record every_entry_was_created_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_every_entry_was_created_interface { every_entry_was_created_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> every_entry_was_created net; every_entry_was_created_in_any_log_invariant : forall (net : network) (e : entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> in_any_log net e -> term_was_created net (eTerm e) } Arguments every_entry_was_created_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_every_entry_was_created_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _)%function_scope
Record leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface { leaderLogs_term_sanity_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_term_sanity net; leaderLogs_currentTerm_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity net; leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate net } Arguments leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params
Record prefix_within_term_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_prefix_within_term_interface { allEntries_leaderLogs_prefix_within_term_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> allEntries_leaderLogs_prefix_within_term net; log_log_prefix_within_term_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> log_log_prefix_within_term net } Arguments prefix_within_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_prefix_within_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _)%function_scope
Record allEntries_votesWithLog_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_allEntries_votesWithLog_interface { allEntries_votesWithLog_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> allEntries_votesWithLog net } Arguments allEntries_votesWithLog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_allEntries_votesWithLog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record terms_and_indices_from_one_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_interface { terms_and_indices_from_one_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_vwl net /\ terms_and_indices_from_one_ll net } Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record leaderLogs_entries_match_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_entries_match_interface { leaderLogs_entries_match_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_entries_match_host net } Arguments leaderLogs_entries_match_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_entries_match_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P ->
Record votesWithLog_sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_votesWithLog_sorted_interface { votesWithLog_sorted_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> votesWithLog_sorted net } Arguments votesWithLog_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_votesWithLog_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record leaderLogs_votesWithLog_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_votesWithLog_interface { leaderLogs_votesWithLog_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_votesWithLog net } Arguments leaderLogs_votesWithLog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_votesWithLog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
maxIndex_non_empty : forall l : list entry, l <> [] -> exists e : entry, In e l /\ maxIndex l = eIndex e /\ maxTerm l = eTerm e
removeAfterIndex_same_sufficient' : forall (x : nat) (l l' : list entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l 0 -> (forall e : entry, In e l' -> 0 < eIndex e) -> x <= maxIndex l -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l -> In e l') -> removeAfterIndex l' x = removeAfterIndex l x
contiguous_app_prefix_2 : forall (l l' l'' : list entry) (i : nat), sorted (l ++ l') -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (l ++ l') 0 -> Prefix l' l'' -> maxIndex l'' < i <= maxIndex l -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e l
maxIndex_app : forall l l' : list entry, maxIndex (l ++ l') = maxIndex l \/ maxIndex (l ++ l') = maxIndex l' /\ l = []
contiguous = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (leaderLog entries : list entry) => (prevLogIndex = 0 \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex leaderLog prevLogIndex = Some e /\ eTerm e = prevLogTerm)) /\ (forall e : entry, In e leaderLog -> eIndex e > prevLogIndex -> eIndex e <= maxIndex entries -> In e entries) /\ (forall e e' : entry, eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e entries -> In e' leaderLog -> e = e') : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), logIndex -> term -> list entry ->...-> Prop Arguments contiguous {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
findGtIndex_contiguous : forall (entries : list entry) (x : nat), sorted entries -> (forall i : nat, 0 < i <= maxIndex entries -> exists e : entry, In e entries /\ eIndex e = i) -> forall i : nat, x < i <= maxIndex entries -> exists e : entry, In e (findGtIndex entries x) /\ eIndex e = i
removeAfterIndex_same_sufficient : forall (x : nat) (l l' : list entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l -> In e l') -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l' -> In e l) -> removeAfterIndex l' x = removeAfterIndex l x
maxIndex_removeAfterIndex : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e = i -> maxIndex (removeAfterIndex l i) = i
entries_match_scratch : forall (es ys : list entry) (plt : term), sorted es -> uniqueIndices ys -> (forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ys -> (forall e3 : entry, eIndex e3 <= eIndex e1 -> In e3 es -> In e3 ys) /\ (0 <> 0 -> exists e4 : entry, eIndex e4 = 0 /\ eTerm e4 = plt /\ In e4 ys)) -> (forall i : nat, 0 < i <= maxIndex es -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e es) -> (forall e : entry, In e es -> 0 < eIndex e) -> (forall y : entry, In y ys -> 0 < eIndex y) -> entries_match es ys
maxIndex_is_max : forall (l : list entry) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> maxIndex l >= eIndex e
findAtIndex_elim : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e -> i = eIndex e /\ In e l
contiguous_range_exact_lo = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (xs : list entry) (lo : nat) => (forall i : nat, lo < i <= maxIndex xs -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e xs) /\ (forall e : entry, In e xs -> lo < eIndex e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> nat -> Prop Arguments contiguous_range_exact_lo {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope _%nat_scope
entries_match_append : forall (xs ys es : list entry) (ple : entry) (pli : nat) (plt : term), sorted xs -> sorted ys -> sorted es -> entries_match xs ys -> (forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ys -> (forall e3 : entry, eIndex e3 <= eIndex e1 -> In e3 es -> In e3 ys) /\ (pli <> 0 -> exists e4 : entry, eIndex e4 = pli /\ eTerm e4 = plt /\ In e4 ys)) -> (forall i : nat, pli < i <= maxIndex es -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e es) ->...-> entries_match (es ++ removeAfterIndex xs pli) ys
Prefix_maxIndex : forall (l l' : list entry) (e : entry), sorted l' -> Prefix l l' -> In e l -> eIndex e <= maxIndex l'
thing : forall (es l l' : list entry) (e e' : entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' 0 -> entries_match l l' -> es <> [] -> Prefix es l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo es (eIndex e) -> In e l -> In e' l' -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> es ++ removeAfterIndex l (eIndex e) = l'
maxIndex_exists_in : forall xs : list entry, maxIndex xs >= 1 -> exists x : entry, eIndex x = maxIndex xs /\ In x xs
S_maxIndex_not_in : forall (l : list entry) (e : entry), sorted l -> eIndex e = S (maxIndex l) -> ~ In e l
sorted_app_in_1 : forall (l1 l2 : list entry) (e : entry), sorted (l1 ++ l2) -> eIndex e > 0 -> In e l1 -> eIndex e > maxIndex l2
entries_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (entries entries' : list entry) => forall e e' e'' : entry, eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e entries -> In e' entries' -> eIndex e'' <= eIndex e -> In e'' entries < -> In e'' entries' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> list entry -> Prop Arguments entries_match {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope
sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix sorted (log : list entry) : Prop := match log with | [] => True | e :: es => (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eIndex e > eIndex e' /\ eTerm e >= eTerm e') /\ sorted es end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments sorted {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
sorted_uniqueIndices : forall l : list entry, sorted l -> uniqueIndices l
removeIncorrect_new_contiguous : forall (new current : list entry) (prev : nat) (e : entry), sorted current -> uniqueIndices current -> (forall e0 e' : entry, eIndex e0 = eIndex e' -> eTerm e0 = eTerm e' -> In e0 new -> In e' current -> e0 = e') -> contiguous_range_exact_lo current 0 -> contiguous_range_exact_lo new prev -> In e current -> eIndex e = prev -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (new ++ removeAfterIndex current prev) 0
contiguous_0_app : forall (l1 l2 : list entry) (e : entry), sorted (l1 ++ l2) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (l1 ++ l2) 0 -> In e l1 -> eIndex e > maxIndex l2
index_in_bounds : forall (e : entry) (es : list entry) (i : nat), sorted es -> In e es -> i <> 0 -> i <= eIndex e -> 1 <= i <= maxIndex es
allEntries_votesWithLog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (t : term) (e : entry) (t' : term) (leader : name) (h : Net.name) (log : list entry), In (t, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t', leader, log) (votesWithLog (fst (nwState net h))) -> t < t' ->...-> Prop Arguments allEntries_votesWithLog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
maxIndex_subset : forall xs ys : list entry, sorted xs -> sorted ys -> (forall x : entry, In x xs -> In x ys) -> maxIndex xs <= maxIndex ys
thing2 : forall (l l' : list entry) (i : nat), l <> [] -> Prefix l l' -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' 0 -> l ++ removeAfterIndex l' i = l'
every_entry_was_created = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (e : entry) (t : term) (h : Net.name) (l : list entry), In (t, l) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e l -> term_was_created net (eTerm e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments every_entry_was_created {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
incoming_entries_in_log : forall (es log : list entry) (x : entry) (i : logIndex), In x es -> uniqueIndices log -> exists y : entry, eIndex x = eIndex y /\ eTerm x = eTerm y /\ In y (es ++ removeAfterIndex log i)
findAtIndex_in : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e' : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e' -> In e' l
app_nil_r : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l ++ [] = l
Prefix_nil : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), Prefix l [] -> l = []
contiguous_sorted_last : forall (l : list entry) (x : entry) (i : nat), sorted (l ++ [x]) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (l ++ [x]) i -> eIndex x = S i /\ contiguous_range_exact_lo l (S i)
app_cons_in : forall (A : Type) (l xs : list A) (a : A) (ys : list A), l = xs ++ a :: ys -> In a l
findAtIndex_index : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e' : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e' -> i = eIndex e'
maxTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxTerm (entries : list entry) : term := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eTerm e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> term Arguments maxTerm {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
leaderLogs_term_sanity = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (log : list entry) (e : entry), In (t, log) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e log -> eTerm e < t : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_term_sanity {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
findGtIndex_sufficient : forall (e : entry) (entries : list entry) (x : nat), sorted entries -> In e entries -> eIndex e > x -> In e (findGtIndex entries x)
findAtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findAtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : option entry := match entries with | [] => None | e :: es => if eIndex e =? i then Some e else if eIndex e <? i then None else findAtIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> option entry Arguments findAtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Inductive in_any_log (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (e : entry) : Prop := in_log : forall h : Net.name, In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> in_any_log net e | in_aer : forall (p : packet) (es : list entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> mEntries (pBody p) = Some es -> In e es ->...-> in_any_log net e Arguments in_any_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments in_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments in_aer {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments in_ll {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope
